description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. In SolarStruggle you're assuming the role of a young Pilot who accidentally stumbles into a conflict of a degree not yet known. Play through 11 exciting missions of the campaign or fight against hordes of enemies in the skirmish mode and unlock all 36 awards!
description.short: In SolarStruggle you're assuming the role of a young Pilot who accidentally stumbles into a conflict of a degree not yet known. Play through 11 exciting missions of the campaign or fight against hordes of enemies in the skirmish mode and unlock all 36 awards!
